name: Detectivez
description:
Detectivez is an game where you fly by the seat of your pants as you follow the adventures of detectives Choco and H.T. Bunz. Explore an exciting town full of wonder as you solve a series of hard hitting cases, like rescuing a cat from a tree and helping an old lady cross the street.

Oh wait. This is a visual novel. You can't do any of those things. You can only read and click.

This game has all the fun of homework without any of the annoying action and excitement of video games.
